security: The document contains Patricia M. Orr's Social Security Number (SSN), which is redacted because public disclosure could "constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest."
summary: This document is a collection of payroll authorization forms and related memoranda for Patricia M. Orr, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing her salary adjustments and termination.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to Patricia M. Orr's employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA) from 1976 to 1978, including payroll authorization forms that detail her various positions, salary adjustments, and eventual termination; it encompasses actions authorized by Thomas N. Downing, Henry B. Gonzalez and Louis Stokes, along with a memo requesting staff to disclose relationships with members of congress for payroll certification purposes, as mandated by the House Finance Office.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records for Patricia M. Orr
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
sender: Thomas N. Downing, Henry B. Gonzalez, Louis Stokes, Budget Officer
